name: Bad Trains
description:
These trains are so rubbish, they can only hold 2 things at once. After that, they just drop the earliest package off the back.

Click and drag to draw tracks, then click the arrow to run the trains. Bring the correct packages to the stations.

Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare. Stay tuned for bug fixes, and then a better version also. Tweet me, blog me.
